Tour Guide

Create and manage in-product tutorials without engineers.
Start a tour

Spectrum Compliance

As the footprint for Adobe's tools and solutions expands, extra care must be taken to ensure consistent approaches in design. That's where Adobe's Spectrum design patterns come in.

Project Tour Guide follows existing Spectrum standards for color, card styles, and more, but it also sets new standards for in-product learning patterns in coachmarks and other forms of in-product guided tutorials.

AUTO-PROGRESS

Configure coachmarks to move between steps based on page interactions, like clicks.

RICH MEDIA

Include rich media like images (PNG, JPG) and even animated GIFs. Video is coming soon.

NAVIGATION

Navigating between steps is easy. Just click on the coachmarks menu and pick a step.

EASY CONFIGURATION

Authoring a tour with the Chrome Extension is so easy anyone can do it.
